summary: A feature-length documentary that chronicles "The Good Life" emcees, the alternative music movement they developed, and their worldwide influence on the art form.
cast: 2Mex|Chali 2na|Cut Chemist|Brian Cross|Regan Farquhar|Nga Fsh|Ellay Khule|Medusa|Myka Nyne|Mear One|Riddlore|Abstract Rude|Garth Trinidad
title: This Is the Life
